title: LEAGUE ICON OPENS UP THEN NOTHING(mac)
body: So all the forums keep saying update to mavericks but you cant get mavericks anymore so i updated to this crappy Yosemite and it still doesnt work. HELP ME PEOPLE, IVE UNINSTALLED AND REINSTALLED AND WAITED NOTHING WORKS

replies.body:
Hi All,

I've been getting a similar (the same?) problem since last night as well. When opening the game the League icon shows, and then the Unspecified Error message... see screenshot. The Launcher fails to open. 

I'm on a Mac 10.9.5. Tried other fixes suggested on the forums such as deleting the solutions folder, but no luck.

Hopefully this information helps Riot get to the bottom of it. 

**Has anyone submitted a ticket about this? **
Yea ive submitted a ticket but no reply as of yet
It seems like a lot of people are having this problem, Hopefully there will be a fix soon.
PEOPLE ITS FIXED, THE RIOT LORDS HAVE HEARD OUR PLEAS!!!!
